attributes.action: Ban noisy fireworks. Make it law to sell noise less fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Ban the sale of noisey fireworks andale it law to sell only noise less ones.
attributes.background: Ban noisy fireworks as they are noisy and upset animals and is not good for there welfare. Elderly people get stressed also from the noise

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:
'Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900

'Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
